names.english: kidney essence nourishing decoction for clearing fire
names.commonEnglish: Kidney Essence Nourishing Pill for Clearing Fire

actions: Clears Heat and drains Fire from the Lungs and Stomach, nourishes Yin, moistens Dryness, generates Fluids, clears Deficiency Fire and quenches thirst.
With Huang Bai, clears Heat and Drains Fire for Yin Deficiency Fire.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin, drains Fire and relieves toxicity.
With Sheng Di Huang, for Kidney Yin Deficiency with Fire Blazing with soreness and swelling in the throat, dry mouth and a parched tongue.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin, generates fluids and cools Heart Fire.
With Mu Dan Pi, for Kidney Yin Deficiency with steaming bones.
Nourishes Kidney Yin, clears Lung Heat, sedates Fire, moistens the Lungs,
Drains Kidney Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
Nourishes Heart Yin, tonifies Liver Blood, calms the Spirit, astringes sweat and generates fluids.
With Zhi Mu, nourishes Liver Blood and Heart Yin to clear Deficiency Fire.
Clears Heat, cools, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, clears Deficiency Fire, dispels Blood Stasis and clears Liver Fire.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat and soothes irritability.

syndromes: Heart and Kidney Yin Deficiency with Empty Fire Rising

modifications.purpose: coronary Heart disease with low-grade fever and night sweats
coronary Heart disease with excess palpitations and insomnia
